text: Carlos Serantes Saavedra (1905 – 31 March 1950) was a sailor from Argentina, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. He also competed in the men's eight event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1950 deaths Category:Argentine male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 8 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Argentina Category:Argentine male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Argentina Category:Rowers at the 1924 Summer Olympics
title: Carlos Serantes
